All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppConfig
General application configuration class.
AuthController
Controller responsible for handling user authentication.
AuthController.JwtRequest
Represents the request body for JWT authentication.
AuthController.JwtResponse
Represents the response body containing the JWT token after successful authentication.
CategoryService
Service class for managing recipe categories.
ConsoleUI
A Spring Component that implements CommandLineRunner to provide a console-based user interface for the Recipe Management System.
CorsConfig
Configuration class for Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS).
GlobalExceptionHandler
Global exception handler for the application.
GlobalExceptionHandler.ErrorDetails
A generic structure for providing details about an error that occurred.
GlobalExceptionHandler.ValidationErrorDetails
An extension of GlobalExceptionHandler.ErrorDetails specifically for validation errors.
HealthController
Controller providing a health check endpoint for the application.
JwtAuthenticationEntryPoint
Custom implementation of AuthenticationEntryPoint for handling JWT authentication failures.
JwtRequestFilter
A Spring Security filter that intercepts incoming HTTP requests to validate JWT tokens.
JwtTokenUtil
Utility class for performing JWT (JSON Web Token) operations.
JwtUserDetailsService
Service implementation for UserDetailsService to load user-specific data.
JwtUserDetailsService.UserInfo
Inner static class to hold user information (username, password, roles) for the in-memory user store.
MongoConfig
Configuration class for MongoDB connection and setup.
ProxyController
A controller intended to act as a proxy or fallback for requests made to a specific hardcoded domain.
Recipe
Represents a recipe in the recipe management system.
RecipeController
Handles HTTP requests related to recipe management.
RecipeDto
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for representing recipe data, typically used for creating or updating recipes through API requests.
RecipeNotFoundException
Custom runtime exception thrown when a requested recipe cannot be found in the system.
RecipeOop1Application
Main application class for the Recipe Management System (RecipeOOP_1).
RecipeRepository
Spring Data MongoDB repository interface for Recipe entities.
RecipeResponse
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for representing a paginated list of recipes.
RecipeService
Service interface defining operations for managing recipes.
RecipeServiceImpl
Implementation of the RecipeService interface.
WebSecurityConfig
Spring Security configuration class for the application.
WelcomeController
Controller that handles requests to the root path ("/") of the application.
